edu.ou.asgbook.usage.Sprawl

edu.ou.asgbook.usage.Sprawl Class Reference

Solution to a classroom assignment to identify regions of urban sprawl from the population density data. More...

Detailed Description

Solution to a classroom assignment to identify regions of urban sprawl from the population density data.

Author:
v.lakshmanan

Member Function Documentation

LatLonGrid  grid2,
File  out 
) throws Exception [static] 

00059                                                                                                  {
00060         // write out input grids
00061         KmlWriter.write(grid1, out, "pop_1990", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00062         KmlWriter.write(grid2, out, "pop_2010", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00063         System.out.println("Resolution of image = " + grid1.getLatRes() + "x" + grid1.getLonRes());
00064         // Find optimal threshold on 2010 data using Otsu's method
00065         final int MIN = 0;
00066         final int MAX = 400;
00067         final int incr = 1;
00068         Histogram hist = new Histogram(MIN, incr, (MAX-MIN)/incr );
00069         hist.update(grid2);
00070         OtsuThresholdSelector thresholder = new OtsuThresholdSelector(hist);
00071         int thresh1 = thresholder.getOptimalThreshold();
00072         System.out.println("Optimal threshold=" + thresh1);
00073         
00074         // A city consists of point with this threshold and contiguous points > some reasonable threshold
00075         int thresh2 = thresh1 * 2;
00076         LabelResult label1990 =  new HysteresisSegmenter(thresh1, thresh2).label(grid1);
00077         KmlWriter.write(label1990.label, out, "label_1990", PngWriter.createRandomColormap());
00078         
00079         LabelResult label2010 =  new HysteresisSegmenter(thresh1, thresh2).label(grid2);
00080         KmlWriter.write(label2010.label, out, "label_2010", PngWriter.createRandomColormap());
00081         
00082         // grow regions and find region properties
00083         RegionProperty[] props1 = RegionProperty.compute(label1990, grid1);
00084         RegionProperty[] props2 = RegionProperty.compute(label2010, grid2);
00085         
00086         // create a new grid that consists of city sizes
00087         LatLonGrid citysize1990 = getCitySize(label1990, props1);
00088         LatLonGrid citysize2010 = getCitySize(label2010, props2);
00089         KmlWriter.write(citysize1990, out, "citysize_1990", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00090         KmlWriter.write(citysize2010, out, "citysize_2010", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00091         
00092         // compute and write out difference in size for every 2010 city
00093         LatLonGrid changeInSize = LatLonGrid.copyOf(citysize2010);
00094         Pixel[] sizechange = new Pixel[props2.length];
00095         for (int i=0; i < sizechange.length; ++i){
00096             sizechange[i] = new Pixel(0, 0,0);
00097         }
00098         for (int i=0; i < citysize2010.getNumLat(); ++i){
00099             for (int j=0; j < citysize2010.getNumLon(); ++j){
00100                 int sz1 = citysize1990.getValue(i,j);
00101                 int sz2 = citysize2010.getValue(i,j);
00102                 int percentChange = 0;
00103                 if (sz1 > 5 && sz2 > 5){ // reasonably big?
00104                     percentChange = (100 * (sz2 - sz1)) / sz1;
00105                     sizechange[ label2010.label.getValue(i,j) ] = new Pixel( i,j, percentChange);
00106                 }
00107                 changeInSize.setValue(i,j, percentChange);
00108             }
00109         }
00110         KmlWriter.write(changeInSize, out, "sprawl_1990_2010", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00111         
00112         // Print out the top cities
00113         Arrays.sort(sizechange, new Comparator<Pixel>(){
00114             @Override
00115             public int compare(Pixel arg0, Pixel arg1) {
00116                 return arg0.getValue() - arg1.getValue();
00117             }
00118         });
00119         for (int i=Math.max(0,sizechange.length-20); i < sizechange.length; ++i){
00120             LatLon loc = citysize2010.getLocation(sizechange[i].getX(), sizechange[i].getY());
00121             System.out.println(  loc +
00122                     " : " + citysize1990.getValue(sizechange[i]) +
00123                     " to " + citysize2010.getValue(sizechange[i]) +
00124                     "  " + getCityNear(loc)
00125             );
00126         }
00127         
00128         // Shrunk?
00129         System.out.println("Cities that have exhibited the least spatial growth:");
00130         for (int i=0; i < Math.min(20,sizechange.length); ++i){
00131             LatLon loc = citysize2010.getLocation(sizechange[i].getX(), sizechange[i].getY());
00132             System.out.println(  loc +
00133                     " : " + citysize1990.getValue(sizechange[i]) +
00134                     " to " + citysize2010.getValue(sizechange[i]) +
00135                     "  " + getCityNear(loc)
00136             );
00137         }
00138     }

00179                                                             {
00180         boolean crop = false; // if false, on USA; if true, on NYC area
00181         runOnPopDensity(crop);

static void edu.ou.asgbook.usage.Sprawl.runOnPopDensity ( boolean  crop  )  throws Exception [static] 

00033                                                                       {
00034         LatLonGrid popdensity1 = GlobalPopulation.read(GlobalPopulation.NORTHAMERICA1990, new GlobalPopulation.LinearScaling());
00035         LatLonGrid popdensity2 = GlobalPopulation.read(GlobalPopulation.NORTHAMERICA, new GlobalPopulation.LinearScaling());
00036         
00037         int x1, x2, x3, x4;
00038         if (crop){
00039             x1 = 900;
00040             x2 = 2500;
00041             x3 = 200;
00042             x4 = 200;
00043         } else {
00044             LatLon nwCorner = new LatLon(60, -130);
00045             LatLon seCorner = new LatLon(12, -52);
00046             x1 = popdensity1.getRow(nwCorner);
00047             x2 = popdensity1.getCol(nwCorner);
00048             x3 = popdensity1.getRow(seCorner) - popdensity1.getRow(nwCorner);
00049             x4 = popdensity1.getCol(seCorner) - popdensity1.getCol(nwCorner);
00050         }
00051         popdensity1 = popdensity1.crop(x1, x2, x3, x4);
00052         popdensity2 = popdensity2.crop(x1, x2, x3, x4);
00053         
00054         File out = OutputDirectory.getDefault("sprawl");
00055         
00056         findSprawl(popdensity1, popdensity2, out);
00057     }
